explains: v. 吞没，淹没；使陷入（某种思绪或情绪）；狼吞虎咽

sentences.en: The crisis threatens to engulf several others.
sentences.cn: 这个危机波及了其它几个成员。

sentences.en: I have come into the deep waters; the floods engulf me.
sentences.cn: 我到了深水中。大水漫过我身。

sentences.en: The next Ice Age could take only weeks to engulf Britain.
sentences.cn: 下次冰期吞噬英国可能只需几个星期。
